title: DVDFab Platinum 5.0.2.5 Multilingual
description:
5.0.2.5 (May 26, 2008)

    * New: Updated language files.
    * Fix: Content may be removed for multi-story title, like "American Gangster" (US).
    * Fix: "Split" mode asks for double layer media.
    * Fix: A crash problem when using "VOB" profile. (DVDFab Mobile Option) 


Main Features

   1. Copy any DVD to hard drive and blank disc.
   2. Convert DVD to iPod, PSP, XboX360, Zune, Archos (and other PVPs), Cell Phone, PDA or other mobile devices. And constantly updated to support more mobile device formats.
   3. Remove all DVD copy protections, like CSS, CPPM, RC, RCE, APS, UOPs, ARccOS, RipGuard, FluxDVD, CORE X2, etc. We will keep working to support any new DVD protections as they appear. Powerful new PathPlayer Technology enhances DVD decryption and allows user-controlled skipping or deleting of unwanted material (FBI Warnings, etc.) by just clicking one button.
   4. Burn to any blank DVD Disc (DVD+R/RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD+R DL, DVD-R DL).
   5. Constantly updated to support latest DVD burners and blank DVD discs.
   6. Very fast copy/burn speed.
   7. Lifetime free upgrades.
   8. Lifetime free support via email, worldwide. 

includes patch  Enjoy From Slickinator
